channel.title: Projects on Heric's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Heric's Site

item.title: My First Project
item.description:
This site was built by converting an XHTML 1.1 template called Notepad.exe into the Hugo static site generator. You can find the original template on Bryant Smith’s website.

The site’s source code will be available on my GitHub: herijooj/hericsite
